overview: Celebrated director Celeste takes viewers on a pulse pounding journey of sex and fear featuring blonde, beach babe Riley Steele and 2008's Best New Starlet Stoya. "Riley Steele: Scream" brings a new, erotic twist to 5 of the most famous teenage horror stories ever told. There are plenty of thrills and chills, including Evan Stone dressed as a horny clown. The A-list cast also stars Alexis Texas, Kelly Divine, Carmen McCarthy & Madison Ivy. Celeste weaves a tale of seduction and lust with an orgy, threesome, boy / girl debauchery, and even some cock throbbing anal action between with Kelly Divine.
title: Riley Steele: Scream
